des:
You can now use Alexa to connect and control all your Razer Gamer Room devices effortlessly with your voice. The Gamer Room Skills let you conveniently control your Razer Chroma™ RGB lighting effects for a personalized ambience to suit your mood.

To use Gamer Room Skills on your setup, follow these steps:
1) Download the Razer Gamer Room App from the App Store or Google Play Store.
2) Create a new RazerID account and log in.
3) Set up and connect your Razer Gamer Room devices on your preferred 2.4 GHz network.
4) Complete the Alexa Account linking via the Razer Gamer Room App.
